data.caption: Clarification sought from Coforge Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Coforge Ltd on December 26 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.moneycontrol.com dated December 26 2025 quoting "Coforge shares slip in early trade as $1-billion Encora deal talk fundraising plans weigh "

The reply is awaited.
